activities: MIS services include OFAC and other regulatory compliance services, consumer reporting services, verification and fraud prevention services, and pre-employment and employee background checking services.  MIS collects information regarding companies and individuals from public sources, within the United States and internationally.  In addition, our members and third parties share their business information with us, including information provided to them by their customers, employees, or job applicants.  We use this information to provide the services described above.  MIS acts as a "data processor" with respect to much of the personal information it receives from the European Economic Area.  When MIS receives personal informatoin as a "data processor", MIS protects that personal information in accordance with the terms of the contract between MIS and the "data controller" and applicable data protection laws.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and customer data.  Predominately automated processed.
